description: Stacks the input data samples to construct the batch. The N input samplesmust have the same shape/length and will be stacked to construct a batch.

params.name: axis
params.description: The axis in the result data along which the inputdata are stacked. Default: 0.

params.name: dtype
params.description: The value type of the output. If itis set to None, the type of input data is used. Default: None.
